descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases ATK by **12%**. Casting Intro Skill or Resonance Skill increases Heavy Attack DMG by **20%** for 15s. Obtaining Shield allows Heavy Attack DMG to ignore **7.2%** of the target's DEF for 7s, stacking up to 5 times. This effect triggers once every 0.5s.
